Hi

 

I downloaded the styles zip and added the Harvard Anglia.xsl file to the styles folder, but when opening word it doesn't appear in the referencing drop down.  Has anyone got any ideas?

 

Also which Harvard style is the standard one?  The download has about 4.

 

Thanks

Please dismiss my question as I've now sorted it.

But I'd still like to know the standard harvard referencing system.

 

Thanks

There is no such thing as the 'standard' Harvard referencing system. 'Harvard referencing' is a name for a family of referencing systems which are all based on (author, date) for in-text citations. So APA and Chicago are also examples of Harvard referencing. You will have to ask your instructor about which style he uses. Don't ask him for the name, ask him for a document (or url) with the full specification of the 'standard' he wishes you to use.
